backend/main.mo: Defines core types and in‑memory state for retailers, products, listings, approvals, and admin authorization with functions for admin bootstrap, role management, and user approval.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, and test IDs for build verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten short summaries of numerous frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining light/dark OKLCH color variables and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell loading the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Router routes, Internet Identity provider, query client, and admin-gated admin/retailers routes.
frontend/src/components/admin/DangerZone: UI card enabling full system wipe with confirmation phrase, error handling, success state, and post-wipe logout flow.
frontend/src/components/admin/RetailerEd: Dialog for editing retailer details and operating hours with validation and save handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/RetailerHo: Editor component for weekly hours and holiday overrides with add, update, and remove logic.
frontend/src/components/admin/Searchable: Popover-based searchable select component using command palette interactions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBootst: Non-visual component triggering admin bootstrap logic when identity changes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminOnly.t: Wrapper that restricts content to authenticated admin users and shows appropriate warnings.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthInitial: Fullscreen overlay shown during login and actor initialization processes.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandImage: Image component with graceful fallback rendering for failed logo or hero images.
frontend/src/components/errors/GlobalErr: Global error boundary capturing runtime and unhandled promise errors and showing fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/errors/Unexpecte: UI screen displaying unexpected runtime errors with options to reload or return home.
frontend/src/components/shop/catalog/use: Offers search, category filtering, and sorting logic for catalog items.
frontend/src/components/shop/CataloguePr: Displays featured product previews by fetching listings and product details, showing a grid of clickable product cards.
Renders the shop footer with branding, credits, and association information.
Provides the main shop header with branding, navigation, authentication controls, and admin access.
frontend/src/components/shop/ShopLanding: Shows the landing hero section with branding, tagline, and a large hero image.
Wraps pages with header, footer, and auth initialization overlay in a full-page layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBootstrapAdmin.ts: Attempts admin bootstrap once per session and refreshes admin-related queries on success or failure.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as provinces, retailers, products, listings, and role applications.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes with custom colors and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root, sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRetailersP: Admin interface for listing, adding, editing, and deleting retailers with form handling and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/shop/AdminDashboardPa: Dashboard for admins to manage products, listings, images, and view analytics with multiple forms and tabs.
frontend/src/pages/shop/JoinUsPage.tsx: Displays available user roles and allows authenticated users to submit role applications except for Master Admin.
frontend/src/pages/shop/MasterAdminRoleA: Master admin page to review, approve, or reject pending role applications with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProductDetailPag: Displays detailed product information with images and retailer listings, handling loading, not-found states, and navigation back to the retailer catalog.
frontend/src/pages/shop/ProvinceListPage: Shows a list of provinces for browsing local retailers, with loading, error, and empty states, plus a call‑to‑action section.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RequestNewProduc: Provides a form for users to request new products or retailers, including validation, submission handling, and success/error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerCatalogP: Renders a retailer’s product catalog with search, filtering, sorting, and enriched product data fetched from additional queries.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RetailerListPage: Lists retailers within a selected town or suburb, handling navigation, loading, errors, and empty results.
frontend/src/pages/shop/RoleApplications: Displays the user's role applications with status badges, loading/error states, and navigation back to the Join page.
frontend/src/pages/shop/TownSuburbListPa: Shows towns/suburbs for a selected province, handling loading and not-found states, and navigates to retailer browsing.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Provides helpers to select primary product images, assemble up to three images, generate image URLs, and check remaining image slots.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Builds safe public asset URLs using Vite's base path handling for dev and production environments.
frontend/src/utils/saProvinces.ts: Exports a constant list of South African provinces and its corresponding type.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and persisting URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors, shadows, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: JSON record of the project's architecture, features, issues, and metadata for build planning and tracking.
